documents.document: @zkarj never mind, I see another post 😂

Hey @pmbillenglish .Will you be sending a message expressing support for refugees and other migrants, such as that done by @JustinTrudeau ?

603 hrs of my life spent taxying, taking off, scaring the clouds and landing. Yay!!!!

@agentK that would be right :-)
@agentK nope. Never looked at my bag. One difference is you can't use a cellphone even on flight mode. Other devices appear ok.
@lukeappleby and Mexico will retaliate, and so the merry-go-round goes around...
@zkarj thanks 😀
@agentK @stevebiddle at Guangzhou, in J, walk up to desk, through once they have looked at passport photo. Poor and professional.
@agentK @stevebiddle ha! Don't forget the extra benefit of paying for a visa/ non visa to fly through the states!
@agentK @stevebiddle to be fair, it means that Air NZ is only twice the price now instead of about 3 times the price 😂
@nzfatmatt @stevebiddle @zkarj @Rosspnz @scottjpalmer they can vary a fair weight also (of you flt to at weights and not standard...) :-)
@stevebiddle @zkarj @nzfatmatt @Rosspnz @scottjpalmer to be fair, a PA18 can reach that speed! More stylish than a B737 also :-)
OK folks, where on the x axis would you put Stuff and NZ Herald? Very low of the Y axis of course :-) https://t.co/Tm0jWBLug9
Not sure if this is NZ Herald's comment on Trump or their own reporting? #GenericGenericSubtitle https://t.co/haWmrmMRgZ
@IndoBushPilot having just got my PA18 rating a few days ago (and first taildragger type), I'd have to agree :-)
@stevebiddle what a rip off @zenergynz ! I saved about 29c a litre today by filling up at a Waitomo station. Didn't have to buy H2O! #winner
@stevebiddle @mattinnz @Rosspnz @aerospacenz @WLGAirport maybe they could build their own multistory carpark... Lol
@stevebiddle looks like you trumped the cheese scone backing competition :-)
@agentK ahhh, that explains a lot. I get a txt verification, but can't login, so I guess that verification needs to be done...
@agentK so what link do you use to sign up?
@agentK I might sign up on the plane in a few months, pretty sure I have seen a form somewhere. Yeah, I know, but still.
@agentK interestingly, there seem to be a few things where the the Chinese only take a Chinese phone number. Maybe this is one of them
@agentK how did that go then?? :-P might perhaps be easier to sign up with another Skyteam member?
@stevebiddle ouch. Oh well, I'll stick with my cc and a little bit of cash. Seems to work well... Thanks
@stevebiddle that's what I thought - very little unless you get a good rate & the rate worsens afterwards + some free ATM trans #cynic
@stevebiddle are actually there any benefits of using this instead of my credit card when I'm overseas?
@billbennettnz looks very interesting, although odd that there's no NFC...
I was just thinking. I wonder what it would feel like to get PA18 written into the type rating page of a logbook? #PrettyGoodActually 😁
@zkarj @markl_nz @NZDefenceForce you need to get over last time :-) Traffic mngmnt looks really well planned this time. Plenty of displays.
A wee bit harsh @markl_nz :-P and not as bad as Wellington Airport making bomb jokes... #cringe lol
Lol!!! EasyJet passenger says cabin crew forced aborted landing because they were 'mucking about' - https://t.co/xVUAQt6kNR
@agentK wow. I haven't been charged anything by my bank (and if they tried months later I would leave).
@agentK is this breaking fixed or after repayment?
@agentK didn't break the flight at all, stayed in lounge in CAN. Flew in Y a 2-3 years ago, they put me in hotel (>8 hrs layover get hotel)
@agentK in-flight SVC good. Not perfect but friendly. Food quite nice. Lounge in CAN rather basic, bit still ok. Going again later this year
@agentK really good experience. Very comfy. Lie flat bed all the way. Emporer Lounge in all. Cz lounge in CAN. Skyteam lounge at lhr.
@agentK really good. Will provide a better answer later :-)
No @Rosspnz . It's a @MetService laser canon. Designed to bring rain where is needed (should be pointed at Aussie perhaps?) :-)
Just don't try cracking the same jokes when you visit Wellington Airport... the humour will be non-existent then :-P https://t.co/snhvNyUYsJ
Weight and Balance https://t.co/GlidpFVJE1
@newcitiesfound not sure. Have not decided yet. I wish I had the power to decide.
@flying_geek that's after allowing for Piper's crazy "sometimes and extra 60 inches" thingy. #timeforbed
Spent all evening trying to get a PA18A-150 weight & balance spreadsheet working. Looks right and looks wrong. Grrrr.
@AndreasMNZ checkmytrip has one advantage-I can provide the airline ref for some airlines and it pulls the data in (written by Amadeus)
@AndreasMNZ still the reviews on Tripitaka are good, so I will take a look. Thanks!
@AndreasMNZ in theory I can do the same with Checkmytrip. What I really want is to enter ref number and have it auto populate
@zkarj @scottjpalmer you'd be a useless journalist mate. A real journalist would not have gotten the manufacturer right. "It's a Cessna" 🚾

@scottjpalmer @stevebiddle @zkarj @mattinnz @nzfatmatt dude. You have all the fun jobs!

@agentK I logged on an redirected a parcel once. Redirection was ignored.... Very annoying.
@nzpost @agentK about you dak the driver for fraud (you know, the bit about signing a document someone else was supposed to sign?).
Got my koru lounge vouchers today. I suppose I can spend less on my cc until the next earning year now? :-)
@stevebiddle @agentK @dingfelder or worse, "fly to NZ from $400" and you end up in Greymouth instead of where you want to be. :-P
@stevebiddle @agentK @dingfelder I dunno. Misleading with all the small text under the large headlines... But yeah, maybe it's "acceptable".
@graysonottaway @stevebiddle well Jetstar is equivalent to Easyjet... So all we need is a market of 50 million more people :-P
@graysonottaway @stevebiddle problem is that there isn't (a sustainable) gap from what I can see. Few will pay $50 more for a seat to Aussie
@stunsworth @charlesarthur @Techmeme yep, I've seen this on YT also. Very off-putting.
@ReskueDave guessing that more important than saving the world is the traffic or drives to them (unfortunately)...

@agentK @stevebiddle not as good as yours though Kai 😂
@agentK @stevebiddle I don't quite understand why people buy Air NZ etc J. I will have comfy ride to lhr on a flat bed for under 5k...
@agentK @stevebiddle that's awesome.
@agentK @stevebiddle I've seen around 8k if you accept being pushed onto Virgin Atlantic in Shanghai. Not looked recently though...

@stevebiddle have Air NZ flight costs been increased yet? Yes I'm cynical :-P
@macilree well-done and fun times ahead?
@billbennettnz sardines have a genetic predisposition towards anger issues? Ha. Either that or very musical...
@billbennettnz maybe they were just a bit wild instead of furious? I would be a bit wild if I was being stuffed in a can :-P
@jetdillo I'd hire the one who leaves... At least they would live to turn up the next day :-)

@agentK this is gold coast right? There r flights on sale and seats avail in July, but very few flights with J seats avail. Equip chg maybe?
